commit message: Simplify File references to String references
Use a tmp file to update preferences
The saved preferences file has now correct user id & group id
Simplify Backup mechanism to only use a String
Single and simple method to save preferences
EditText are provided with colored FloatLabelLayout

Fix checked state of menu items

Theme switcher

Backport old backup system. Should preserve previous backups when updating the app.
Performance improvements with huge preference values
